alert.note: Alert for Harris; Meriwether; Talbot; Troup (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 25 at 7:47PM EDT until June 25 at 8:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Meriwether County in west central Georgia... Southeastern Troup County in west central Georgia... Western Talbot County in west central Georgia... Harris County in west central Georgia... * Until 830 PM EDT. * At 747 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Crest to near Stovall to Valley, moving south at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Hamilton, Talbotton, Manchester, West Point, Pine Mountain, Waverly Hall, Warm Springs, Woodland, Pine Mountain-Callaway Gardens, Shiloh, Goat Rock Lake, Ellerslie, F.d. Roosevelt State Park, Cataula, Baughville, Flint Hill, Mountain Hill, Bartletts Ferry Dam, Fortson and Pine Mountain Valley. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
